OUTLINE : Patients receive cetuximab IV 60-120 minute weekly week 1-5 . Patients undergo 1 fraction stereotactic-body radiotherapy ( RT ) week 2 . At 4 week RT completion , patient may receive additional cetuximab IV combine 28-day chemotherapy regimen , per investigator discretion . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 2 month 1 year , every 3-4 month 1 year , every 6 month 2 year , annually thereafter .
